content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x1) with coal inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with coal inserted

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is available for insertion before attempting to insert items. Check if the furnace is already processing or has enough input slots.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnace has finished processing. Attempting to extract while the furnace is still working may lead to unexpected results.

### Errors when updating inventory
- Regularly check the inventory after each operation to ensure that the expected changes have occurred. This helps in identifying any discrepancies early on.
